remarks: Property of being a distributive lattice.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
statement:
isdlat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isdlat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
isdlat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
isdlat $p |- ( K e. DLat <-> ( K e. Lat /\ A. x e. B A. y e. B A. z e. B ( x ./\ ( y .\/ z ) ) = ( ( x ./\ y ) .\/ ( x ./\ z ) ) ) ) $.
$d ./\ x y z $.
$d .\/ x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
